TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit WSFederationMessage extends System.IdentityModel.Services.FederationMessage
Public MustInherit Class WSFederationMessage Inherits FederationMessage

summary.span: 表示 WS-Federation 消息并定义基类，通过其可衍生更具体 WS-Federation 消息。

span.span: Represents a WS-Federation message and defines the base class from which more specialized WS-Federation message classes derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示 Ws 联合身份验证请求或 Ws 联合身份验证响应。The class represents either a WS-Federation request or a WS-Federation response. 表示特定 WS 联合身份验证消息的更专业化类派生自 ; 例如， 类，该类表示 ws-federation 登录请求消息。More specialized classes that represent specific WS-Federation messages derive from ; for example, the class, which represents a WS-Federation sign-in request message. 类公开几个可用于设置或访问单个消息参数的属性。The class exposes several properties that can be used to set or access individual message parameters. 还可以通过字典设置或访问这些参数 。These parameters can also be set or accessed through the dictionary. 例如，可以通过 属性或通过将 "wencoding" 指定为字典的键来读取消息中的 wencoding 参数 。For example, you can read the wencoding parameter in the message either through the property or by specifying "wencoding" as the key to the dictionary. 包含一些静态方法，您可以调用这些方法来创建相应的 WS 联合身份验证消息：包含查询字符串的 url、基 URL 以及 WS 联合身份验证参数名称和值的集合，或在 HTTP 请求中窗体发布数据。The contains static methods that you can call to create the appropriate WS-Federation message from: a URL that includes a query string; a base URL and a collection of WS-Federation parameter names and values; or form post data in an HTTP request. [!INCLUDE[wif_wsfed_ref](~/includes/wif-wsfed-ref-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Uri baseUrl, string action) cil managed
Public Sub New (baseUrl As Uri, action As String)

param.name: baseUrl
param.span: WS-Federation 消息应用的基 URL。

span.span: The base URL to which the WS-Federation message applies.

param.span: 这是没有任何询问参数的 URL。

span.span: This is the URL without any query parameters.
Sets the property.

param.name: action

span.span: The wa parameter of the message.

param.span: 指定要执行的操作；例如，WS 联合身份验证登录请求的“wsignin1.0”。

span.span: Specifies the action to be performed; for example "wsignin1.0" for a WS-Federation sign-in request.
Sets the property.

summary.span: 从该消息应用的基 URL 和要执行的操作（wa 消息参数）来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from the base URL to which the message applies and the action to be performed (the wa message parameter).
is .
is or an empty string.
is not a valid, absolute URI.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Action { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Action : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置消息的 wa 参数。

span.span: Gets or sets the wa parameter of the message.
The value of the wa parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wa 参数指定要执行的操作。The wa parameter specifies the action to be performed. 例如，对于登录方案， 属性设置为 "wsignin1.0 1.0"，对于注销方案，属性设置为 "wsignout1.0 1.0"。For example, for sign-in scenarios the property is set to "wsignin1.0" and for sign-out scenarios, the property is set to "wsignout1.0". Wa 参数是必需的，因此此属性不能设置为 `null` 或空字符串。The wa parameter is required, so this property cannot be set to `null` or an empty string.

exception.span: 尝试设置一个为 或空字符串的值。

span.span: An attempt to set a value that is or empty occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Context { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Context : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置消息的 wctx 参数。

span.span: Gets or sets the wctx parameter of the message.
The value of the wctx parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在请求中传递了所颁发的令牌，则指定必须返回的上下文值。Specifies a context value that must be returned with the issued token if it is passed in the request. 此值是不透明的，也就是说，它的语义只由消息的发起方识别（通常是信赖方-RP）;消息或任何中介的接收方不会对其进行解释。The value is opaque, that is, its semantics are known only by the originator of the message (typically a relying party - RP); it is not interpreted by the receiver of the message or any intermediaries. Wctx 参数是可选的。The wctx parameter is optional. 将 属性设置为 `null` 或空字符串，以便从消息中删除 wctx 参数。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wctx parameter from the message. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果你的应用程序接收到带有 wctx 参数集的 WS 联合身份验证消息，则应确保在发送方的任何响应中返回相同的值，或者在将消息传递给另一方时转发该消息。If your application receives a WS-Federation message with the wctx parameter set, it should ensure that the same value is returned in any response to the sender, or forwarded if the message is passed on to another party.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationMessage CreateFromFormPost(class System.Web.HttpRequestBase request) cil managed
Public Shared Function CreateFromFormPost (request As HttpRequestBase) As WSFederationMessage

param.name: request
param.span: 包含窗体发布参数请求的请求。

span.span: The request that contains the form post.

summary.span: 从指定请求接收的窗体发送中创建 WS-Federation 消息。

span.span: Creates a WS-Federation message from the form post received in the specified request.

returns.span: 生成的消息或如果消息无法生成则为 。

span.span: The message that was created or if a message cannot be created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果可以创建消息，则方法将根据在 窗体 post 中提交的 wa 参数返回适当的实现; 例如，如果 wa 参数是 "wsignout1.0 1.0"，则 返回一个对象。If a message can be created, the method returns an appropriate implementation of based on the wa parameter submitted in the form post; for example, if wa parameter is "wsignout1.0" then a object is returned. 获取由客户端从请求提交并调用方法的窗体变量的基 URL 和集合 。Gets the base URL and the collection of form variables submitted by the client from the request and invokes the method.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationMessage CreateFromNameValueCollection(class System.Uri baseUrl, class System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection collection) cil managed
Public Shared Function CreateFromNameValueCollection (baseUrl As Uri, collection As NameValueCollection) As WSFederationMessage

param.name: baseUrl
param.span: 联合消息应用的基 URL。

span.span: The base URL to which the message is intended.
The that contains the parameters for the message.

summary.span: 从参数的 创建 WS-Federation 消息。

span.span: Creates a WS-Federation message from a of parameters.

returns.span: 生成的消息或如果消息无法生成则为 。

span.span: The message that was created or if a message cannot be created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数集合必须包含 wa 参数的条目，该参数指定要执行的操作。The parameter collection must contain an entry for the wa parameter, which specifies the action to be performed. 如果 wa 条目不是已识别的操作，则会引发异常。If the wa entry is not a recognized action, an exception is thrown. 参数集合应包含集合中 wa 参数指定的消息种类的相应参数。The parameter collection should contain appropriate parameters for the kind of message specified by the wa parameter in the collection. 方法将基于 wa 参数返回相应的实现 。The method will return an appropriate implementation of based on the wa parameter. 下表列出了 为各种参数组合返回的实现。The following table lists the implementation returned for various parameter combinations. |返回类型Type returned|wa 指定的查询参数wa query parameter specified|注释Comments| |-------------------|----------------------------------|--------------| ||wattr 1。0wattr1.0|--| ||wpseudo 1。0wpseudo1.0|--| ||wsignin1.0wsignin1.0|`collection`必须包含 wtrealm 或 wreply 参数。`collection` must contain either a wtrealm or a wreply parameter. 如果 `collection` 包含 wresult 或 wresultptr 参数，则返回一个登录响应消息（请参阅下一行）。If `collection` contains a wresult or a wresultptr parameter, a sign-in response message is returned (see next row).| ||wsignin1.0wsignin1.0|如果 `collection` 包含 wresult 或 wresultptr 参数，则返回。Returned if `collection` contains a wresult or wresultptr parameter. 只能存在一个。Only one may be present. 如果两者都存在，则会引发异常。If both are present, an exception is thrown.| ||wsignout1.0 1。0wsignout1.0|--| ||wsignoutcleanup1.0 1。0wsignoutcleanup1.0|--|

span.span: is .
-or-
is .

exception.span: wa 参数在参数集合中不可被识别。

span.span: The wa parameter in the parameter collection is not recognized.

exception.span: 登录响应消息在参数集合中同时具有 wresult 和 wresultptr 参数。

span.span: A sign-in response message has both the wresult and wresultptr parameter in the parameter collection.

exception.span: （合法的登录答案信息的 wa 参数与“wsignin1.0”等效，wsiesult 与 wresultptr 参数也等效，但这两组等效参数不可同时发生。）

span.span: (A valid sign-in response message has the wa parameter equal to "wsignin1.0" and either the wresult or the wresultptr parameter, but not both.)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationMessage CreateFromUri(class System.Uri requestUri) cil managed
Public Shared Function CreateFromUri (requestUri As Uri) As WSFederationMessage

param.name: requestUri

span.span: The URI from which to create the message.

param.span: 指定于查询字符串的消息参数。

span.span: Message parameters are specified in the query string.
The wa parameter must be present.

summary.span: 从指定的 URI 中创建一条 WS-Federation 消息。

span.span: Creates a WS-Federation message from the specified URI.

summary.span: 参数假定在查询字符串中指定。

span.span: The parameters are assumed to be specified in the query string.
The message that was created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根据查询字符串中的 wa 参数返回适当的实现; 例如，如果 wa 参数是 "wsignout1.0 1.0"，则 返回一个对象。Returns an appropriate implementation of based on the wa parameter in the query string; for example, if wa parameter is "wsignout1.0" then a object is returned. 根据查询字符串中存在的参数的组合和值，可能会引发其他异常。Other exceptions may be thrown depending on the combination and values of parameters present in the query string. 调用 方法。Invokes the method.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 不能从指定的 URI 中创建消息。

span.span: A message cannot be created from the specified URI.

member this.Encoding : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置消息的 wencoding 参数。

span.span: Gets or sets the wencoding parameter of the message.
The value of the wencoding parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定要用于消息中嵌入的任何 XML 的编码样式。Specifies the encoding style to be used for any XML embedded in the message. Wencoding 参数是可选的。The wencoding parameter is optional. 将 属性设置为 `null` 或空字符串，以便从消息中删除 wencoding 参数。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wencoding parameter from the message.
